title: Technical Skills
text:
Technical Skills



GIS Softwares: QGIS and ArcGIS (including PyQGIS and ArcPy)
Web Development: HTML, CSS and JavaScript
Version control tool: Git




Programming Language: Python
Cloud Platform: Google Earth Engine
Others: OpenStreetMap, eCognition, Quarto, Overleaf, Adobe Illustrator, etc.





Work Experience

Research Assistant (March 2024 - now) , Heidelberg Institute for Geoinformation Technology (HeiGIT), Germany
Remote Sensing Analyst Intern (Summer 2022), German Aerospace Center (DLR), Germany
Commodity Insights - Data Assistant (January 2022 - June 2022) , Aldi Süd Holdings, Austria
GIS Analyst (October 2019 - July 2021) , Kathmandu Living Labs, Nepal



Education

Master’s Degree in Earth Observation, Geoinformatics and Geovisualization (2021-2023) from University of Salzburg, Austria and Palacký University Olomouc, Czechia under the Erasmus Mundus Scholarship
Bachelor’s Degree in Geomatics Engineering (2015-2019) from Tribhuvan University, Nepal

title: Maps and Geovisualization
text:
I like to make maps and visualizations at the intersection of open data, disasters and GIS.










Earthquakes in Nepal







Violence in Cabo Delgado









Buddha Air flight operation







Landlocked developing countries









NDVI for Prague







Growth of building footprints in Herat, Afghanistan






More maps and visualizations can be viewed here

title: Rabin Ojha
text:
Hi everyone, my name is Rabin Ojha. I am originally from Nepal but currently based in Germany.
I have a Bachelor’s degree in Geomatics Engineering and Master’s degree in Earth Observation, Geoinformatics and Geovisualization. My interest lies in open geospatial data, cartography and working with remote sensing for disasters. I have around 4 years of experience in the geospatial domain.
